text: Aspronema is a genus of skinks. ==Species== The following 2 species, listed alphabetically by specific name, are recognized as being valid: *Aspronema cochabambae (Dunn, 1935) *Aspronema dorsivittatum (Cope, 1862) – Paraguay mabuya Nota bene: A binomial authority in parentheses indicates that the species was originally described in a genus other than Aspronema. Both species are found in South America. Both species were previously placed in the genus Mabuya. ==References== Category:Lizard genera Category:Taxa named by Stephen Blair Hedges Category:Taxa named by Caitlin E. Conn
title: Aspronema
